index.contactDescription: Does your building have a Legionella problem? Do you think we can do something for you or would you like more information, feel free to contact us for an exploratory talk. Every question will be treated confidentially.

index.title: Controlling legionella in tapwater
product.description: With the innovative domestic hot water controller you can lower the energy use, cost and infection risk during production, storage and distribution of your domestic hot water. This is possible by lowering the domestic hot water production temperature, while keeping the Legionella pneumophila risk under control with the heat shock regime.
product.title: More info coming soon!
services.description: LoWatter provides case specific knowledge through consultancy on either disinfection or energy savings with a Legionella pneumophila predicting simulation model in order to lower the energy use, cost and infection risk during production, storage and distribution of domestic hot water.
services.title: More info coming soon!
